title: System Technology Experience
brief: The software world have a wide variety of problem, one must be familiar with multiple tools to select the right tool for the job.

cards.title: Java
cards.description: My main programming languages for developing desktop applications and backend systems. Used to developed application such as Quoridor, GroupUp, and Pet Adoption App.

cards.title: Typescript
cards.description: Used to develop all web related projects. Example such as this website, sudoku solver web, and web multiplayer maze.

cards.title: C++
cards.description: Primarily used in competitive programing due to the performance benefit it offered over other heavy runtime programing languages.

cards.title: Python
cards.description: Mainly for AI/ML project, Django applications and some automation. Some usage includes TSP visualizer, CTF laptop lending system, and Knowledge-Base-Backend.

cards.title: C#
cards.description: Used during the internship to develop Windows desktop applications to validate networking hardware and perform security verification in the device ROM.

cards.title: Rust
cards.description: Recently learned programming language. It offers some safety memory guarantee while being extremely performent. More project coming soon.
